alert.note: Alert for Cass; Mason (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 7:51PM CST until January 31 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River near Chandlerville affecting Cass and Mason Counties. .An ice jam will cause water to infiltrate the lowlands along the river. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River near Chandlerville. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 459.9 feet, Flooding begins to impact some residences in Chandlerville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 457.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM CST Saturday was 459.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight to 456.1 feet Monday morning. It will then rise to flood stage early Wednesday morning. It will fall for the remainder of the period. - Flood stage is 456.6 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Sangamon River Chandlerville 456.6 457.0 Sat 7 pm CST 456.1 456.3 456.6 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to remain aware of the latest forecasts and associated flood risk for their area. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
